experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer II
experiences.description: Led the development of a secure, offline, on-prem AI-based health monitoring system for the medical department, integrating an intelligent agent workflow for high-accuracy insights. Spearheaded the design of a scalable FastAPI solution with automated testing and CI/CD for seamless deployment.
keyFeatures: 98% accuracy achieved in AI-driven health monitoring insights.
100% offline functionality enabled for secure, on-prem medical operations.
Improvement in inventory tracking efficiency through AI-driven monitoring.
Reduction in deployment time with containerized FastAPI and CI/CD integration.

experiences.title: AI Engineer
experiences.description: Designed and deployed an AI-driven system to extract and structure unstructured data from Pakistan news and defense sources. Implemented an intelligent agent for data aggregation and analysis, enabling efficient query-based retrieval and actionable insights.
keyFeatures: Developed a robust pipeline for extracting and structuring unstructured data.
Enabled efficient query-based retrieval for real-time insights.
Deployed an intelligent agent to analyze aggregated data.
Automated data processing to enhance decision-making efficiency.
Improved data accessibility and retrieval speed by 40%.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experiences.description: Developed end-to-end machine learning pipelines for structured data, images, and NLP, with a strong focus on model explainability, fairness, and feedback loops. Engineered synthetic data generation solutions and optimized document-based question-answering using LLMs.
keyFeatures: Built ML pipelines ensuring robust model testing and performance evaluation.
Improved overall model accuracy by 10â€“15% through iterative refinements.
Designed and implemented synthetic data generation with 85% accuracy, reducing costs and enhancing data availability.
Developed Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines for document-based question-answering with LLMs.
Created Power BI/Tableau dashboards for seamless data visualization and insightful analytics.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Intern
experiences.description: Provided effective support on live projects, solving complex problems and leveraging Machine Learning and Deep Learning to develop innovative solutions. Gained hands-on experience in AI model optimization and real-time issue resolution.
